column4: I was using smuxi perfectly until I changed the preferences and now I can't open the program. It keeps crashing. I tried reinstalling with no luck. Any suggestions?
when you uninstalled, did you purge the config files?   sudo apt-get remove --purge appname
yes. Then, I reinstall and it doesn't launch.

have you launched it from command line (I personally don't know what smuxi is, so if that's the only way to launch, forgive me)?  what error messages are you given (use http://paste.ubuntu.com for multiple lines)
http://paste.ubuntu.com/459989/
Any luck?
haven't found anything yet....still looking
Thanks. Maybe there is a problem with the build. I'm thinking since it's giving "Smuxi.Frontend.Gnome" that's a problem with the actual code, not the config.
Thanks for your help man. I'm thinking that it's a problem with the actual build. Nothing we can do. Thanks again!
if you'd like i can try to take a look at the config file...you can pastebin it, just make sure that you take your passwords out of it before posting
I can't even find the config file. It's not in my home or in /usr/share. I can't even find anything in gconf-editor
what about in ~/.config/smuxi/smuxi-engine.ini
Aha. Let me get that for you.
remember to remove your password(s)
http://paste.ubuntu.com/459995/ thanks so much.
no guarantees, as I have no experience with that program, but I'll try :)
thanks. If we can't make progress, can I just delete that .ini file?
sorry, couldn't find anything that was out of place :-\
AHA! I deleted it and restarted the program and it's fixed.
Thanks for your help!
glad you got it working...sorry I couldn't be of more assistance though :)
But you helped a lot! I wouldn't have found that config file without you!
